unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtaking, if first half of the pack but not first, during the late-race.
review: Decent horse for medium and long. Comes with Gourmand for one guaranteed golden recovery. Lackluster parent but affinity is pretty decent.

unique: The View from the Lead is Mine!
unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when in first place, with a lead greater than 1 length on the last straight.
review: A strong front mile runner, especially later when she gets buffed. Having built-in Concentration helps her do well in Team Trials.

secrets.conditions: Win the Mainichi Okan
secrets.rewards: 4 random stats +3, Skill points +35, Early Lead hint +1, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.45 for 5.0s when 1st to 3rd place, has an overtake target, less than 1 length behind from the uma ahead and on the last straight.
review: Just an okay medium horse and a so-so long horse. Lacks golden recovery skills. Unique skill maybe useful for inheritance. She will get buffed later on making her a pretty strong uma for CM.

secrets.conditions: Win the Triple Crown (Satsuki Sho, Tokyo Yushun (Japanese Derby), Kikuka Sho)
secrets.rewards: All stats +3, Skill points +45, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4

secrets.conditions: Win the Osaka Cup, Tenno Sho (Spring) and Takarazuka Kinen in Senior Year.

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when 1st to 5th place, has an overtake target for at least 2s and on the last straight.
review: Better than original Teio as a runner due to having easy access to two golden recoveries and a unique that is easier to trigger. It is a weaker skill to inherit however.

secrets.conditions: Win the Triple Crown (Satsuki Sho, Tokyo Yushun (Japanese Derby), Kikuka Sho)
secrets.rewards: All stats +3, Skill points +45, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4

secrets.conditions: Win the Osaka Cup, Tenno Sho (Spring) and Takarazuka Kinen in Senior Year.

unique_explanation: Increases acceleration by 0.4 for 2.4s if 1st to 5th place on the final corner.
review: Very strong parent horse for certain tracks. Her unique can be inherited on all styles depending on the track layout. The uma herself is somewhat flexible and can even be used in dirt races.

secrets.conditions: Win the Radio Nikkei Sho
secrets.rewards: Energy -15, All stats +3, Skill points +60, Mood +1, Get Hot Topic status

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.45 for 5.0s when 2nd to 5th place, 200m before race ends.
review: Great all arounder uma that can fill in mile, dirt, medium and long in Team Trials. Inheritable skill is also pretty strong. The goatest of goats, no bias :D

secrets.conditions: Participate in the Tenno Sho (Spring)
secrets.rewards: Energy -20/-15, Mood +1, 1 random stat +4/+10, Skill points +25/+45

secrets.conditions: Do not participate in the Tenno Sho (Spring)

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.25 for 6.0s when last half of the pack between 50% to 60% of the race.
skills: I Can See Right Through You
review: Generically good End Closer. Comes with a golden recovery that works pretty decently. Usually outclassed by another End Closer for Champion's Meet such as Narita Taishin, but does decently anyways.

secrets.conditions: Win Takarazuka Kinen Year 2 and 3
secrets.rewards: All stats +3, Mood +1, Skill points +45, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4 || All stats +3, Mood +1, Skill points +45, (random) Get Charming status, (random) Obtain Gatekept skill, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when first half of the pack, but not 1st or 2nd, less than 200m before race ends and less than 1 length away from the uma in front and behind.
review: Vodka will be buffed in the future making her a decent Champion's Meet uma. For now she just fills for Team Trial Mile races. Having her own built-in golden recovery lets you run power cards, which is also a big plus.

secrets.conditions: Win the Yasuda Kinen (Year 3)
Win the Yasuda Kinen twice
secrets.rewards: All stats +3, Skill points +45, Nimble Navigator hint +1, Get Practice Perfect status, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.25 and acceleration by 0.3 for 5.0s when 1st place, greater than 1 length away from the uma behind and in the second half of the race.
review: Great horse that can slot in Mile and Medium (and even Long if you need, but you probably have other options). Her potential only works on Medium and Pace Chaser, so keep that in mind. In Team Trials, she shines better as a Front.

secrets.conditions: Participate in the Japanese Oaks
Win the Tenno Sho (Autumn Year 3)

unique_explanation: Increases acceleration by 0.4 for 2.4s if first half of the pack but greater than 3rd place on the final corner.
review: Similar to Maruzensky, Taiki's unique skill is very strong on certain tracks making her an ideal parent. Her gold skills will get buff later making her a strong racer. She is also pretty flexible as she can fill in your Dirt, Mile or Sprint Team Trial slots.

unique: Where There's a Will, There's a Way
unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtaking, greater than 4th place on the last straight.
review: A decent uma for CM, where she shines as a hybrid debuffer and gambler. She can win with enough luck with On Your Left! and other acceleration skills while debuffing the others.

unique_explanation: Recover HP by 7.5% when overtaken, last 60% (4th place or higher for Champion's Meet, 5th place or higher for Team Trials) of the pack during the mid-race.
review: She has the equivalent of 3 golden heal skills, with 2 of them being buffed later. She doesn't have built in acceleration skills so she isn't that good of a Champion's Meet uma. Her unique, when inherited, does 3.5% healing so it is pretty strong if you need extra heals.

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s for the final straight when overtaking and the uma behind is you closer to the inner fence, while being in the last 60% of the pack (4th place or higher for Champion's Meet, 5th place or higher for Team Trials) in the final corner and beyond.
review: Has both corners and straightaways for End Closers in her potential but she's just a mediocre runner.

secrets.conditions: Win the Triple Tiara (Oka Sho, Japanese Oaks, Shuka Sho)
secrets.rewards: Mood +1, All stats +5, Skill points +60, Steadfast hint +2, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s if first 30% of the pack (by distance) on the final corner.
review: Decent horse for Team Trials and gets a buff later on to be somewhat decent in Champion's Meet. Has a strategy with Urara for specific Champion's Meet maps but otherwise so-so.

secrets.conditions: Win the senior Autumn Triple Crown (Tenno Sho (Autumn Year 3), Japan Cup (Year 3), Arima Kinen (Year 3))

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when 1st to 3rd place, be an overtake target for at least 1s, on the final corner and beyond, less than 1 length ahead of the uma behind and having less than 35% HP remaining.
review: Kinda bad uma, unique skill almost never triggers. Okay enough for Team Trials. Will get a buff later making her much more usable.

secrets.conditions: Win the senior Autumn Triple Crown (Tenno Sho (Autumn Year 3), Japan Cup (Year 3), Arima Kinen (Year 3))

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.25 and acceleration by 0.3 for 5.0s when 1st or 2nd place, with more than 30% HP remaining, on the last straight.
review: As a runner, she is pretty flexible in Team Trials, filling in Dirt, Mile, Medium and even Long with Pace or Late style. Her skills however aren't suited for Dirt/Mile and her unique only works consistently on Fronts. Decent as a Front parent.

unique_explanation: Increases acceleration by 0.4 for 4s if between 4th to 7th (Champion's Meet) or 4th to 9th (Team Trials), when an overtake target exists during the final corner.
review: A Late Surger Mile uma with an okay inheritable. Acceleration skills are good but its a bit of an odd fit on her as she might need some velocity skills in the final corner to be in range of an overtake target as a Late Surger.

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s if 1st to 4th place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, less than 1 length away from the uma in front and behind and on the final corner.
review: A decent uma for Champion's Meet when the last spurt starts after the final corner. A consistent uma for Team Trials.Her unique is a bit hard to trigger, will get buffed later.

secrets.conditions: Win the Autumn Triple Crown in either year (Tenno Sho (Autumn), Japan Cup, Arima Kinen). Doable multiple times.

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s first 75% of the pack but not 1st place, with an overtake target uma closer to the fence than yours, on the final corner and beyond.
review: Decently strong uma, easy to gain stats in. After buffs, her unique will be a good skill to inherit on non-front umas.

secrets.conditions: Win the Triple Crown (Satsuki Sho, Tokyo Yushun (Japanese Derby), Kikuka Sho) or win at least 5 G1 races before the third year.
secrets.rewards: Increased difficulty and rewards of future training goals || Nothing happens

secrets.conditions: Participate in the Takarazuka Kinen (Year 2) and beat Biwa Hayahide
Participate in the Takarazuka Kinen (Year 2) and lose to Biwa Hayahide

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.45 for 5.0s on the last straight if you have already overtaken at least 3 umas since the late-race phase.
review: Strong parent for Late Surgers and End Closers, especially when Mejiro Ryan or Dober isn't good. With buffs later, she becomes a very consistent Team Trial uma. As a debuffer, she isn't good as she can't use her own card. Can work as a hybrid.Decent uma for Champion's Meet too, and is flexible enough to fill other conditions.

secrets.conditions: Win 7 G1 races.
Win 8 G1 races.

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtaking, greater than 4th place on the final corner.
review: Her aptitude makes her a Pace Chaser uma but her unique skill is hard to trigger as a Pace. She can flex into Sprint, if you're lacking umas for Team Trials but she doesn't really have much going for her. Cheap End Closer debuff for Champion's Meet if needed.

secrets.conditions: Win the Triple Tiara (Oka Sho, Japanese Oaks, Shuka Sho)
secrets.rewards: All stats +3, Skill points +59, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when first half of the pack but not 1st or 2nd, has an overtake target and during the mid-race.
review: Will be buffed later, making her a strong Champion's Meet uma on Mile length. Her mid-race speed buff can help her close gaps and trigger overtake based skills. Currently a pretty bad uma.

secrets.conditions: Win the Triple Tiara (Oka Sho, Japanese Oaks, Shuka Sho)
secrets.rewards: All stats +3, Skill points +59, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4

unique_explanation: Increases acceleration by 0.4 for 4.0s if 1st place, on a corner, during the late-race.
review: Meta parent for Front Runners. Her unique is good on Medium and Mile tracks and is desired for all Front Runners and Pace Chasers (during a no front track). She herself is not that good of a runner.

secrets.conditions: Win the Triple Crown (Satsuki Sho, Tokyo Yushun (Japanese Derby), Kikuka Sho)

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtaking, between 1st to 4th place, on the final corner.
review: An uma with lots of stamina recovery (especially after buffs). Consistent for Team Trials. Nothing spectacular for Champion's Meet.

secrets.conditions: Win the Takarazuka Kinen (Year 3)
secrets.rewards: All stats +3, Skill points +45, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4, (random) Prepared to Pass hint +1

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.25 and acceleration by 0.3 for 5.0s when 1st to 3rd place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, and on the final corner.
review: A very flexible uma that can run in any style, and with a bit of work, any length (even dirt races). She is an ideal investment option for F2P players as she is usable in almost all content. After buffs, her golden skills will also be much more useful and she will also unlock additional accelerations for all her styles. Is a good uma.

unique_explanation:
Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtaking, if first 40% of the pack, on the final corner.
 Increases acceleration by 0.4 for 4.0s when overtaking, if between 50% to 80% of the pack, on the final corner.
review: Her unique is a bit unreliable due to the specific conditions. If she passes at the right time, she can accelerate into a win, if she doesn't, her speed boost may not do much. She is also a good hybrid debuffer uma as she has access to Mystifying Murmur.

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when 1st to 3rd place, no late start and never rushed, on the last straight.
review: A mediocre uma. Outclassed by other Front Runners for Champion's Meet. Okay for Team Trials.

secrets.conditions: Win the Tokyo Yushun (Japanese Derby)
Win the Triple Crown (Satsuki Sho, Tokyo Yushun (Japanese Derby), Kikuka Sho)

unique_explanation: Increases acceleration by 0.4 for 4.0s if 6th place (for Champion's Meet) or 8th place (for Team Trials), on a corner during the late-race.
review: Champion's Meet meta parent for Late Surgers and End Closers. On tracks where the last spurt starts on a corner, her skill will be very very helpful. As a runner, she is mediocre. Her unique is also not that good for Team Trials (needs 8th position).

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtaking, between 1st to 4th place, on the last straight.
review: Decent uma for Long Team Trials. Doesn't really have much to write home about.

unique_explanation: Recover HP by 5.5% when first 40% of the pack but third place or greater, on any corner, during the second half of the race.
review: Kind of a mixed bag. Unique isn't good to inherit generally, only usable on Christmas Oguri. Her debuff is better on Late but she is a Pace Chaser. Not a spectactular Champion's Meet uma either.

secrets.conditions: Participate in the Satsuki Sho
secrets.rewards:
If Mood Good or Better
Wit +5

If Mood Normal or worse
Wit +5, Objective race changed to NHK Mile Cup

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when 1st to 5th place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, and on the last straight.
review: A very mediocre uma.

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.25 and acceleration by 0.3 for 5.0s when overtaking, if top 40% of the pack but not 1st or 2nd, between 50% to 65% of the race (by distance).
review: A decent consistent uma for Team Trials as a Sprint Pace Chaser. For Champion's Meet, her unique doesn't always trigger at the right moments to bring the acceleration into the spurt.

secrets.conditions: Reach May 2 Year 2
Win the Hakodate Sprint Stakes (Year 3), Keeneland Cup (Year 3), Centaur Stakes (Year 3)
secrets.rewards: Energy +25, Mood +1, Speed +15, Power +15, Sprinting Gear hint +2

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when 1st to 3rd place, blocked on the sides for more than 2s, and in second half of the race.
review: Good free option for Sprint Team Trials. She is better as a Pace Chaser than Front Runner, but she can do both. Fit appropriately into your Team Trial lineup depending on your available umas.

secrets.conditions: Win the Sprinters Stakes (Year 2) and the Sprinters Stakes (Year 3)
secrets.rewards: Mood +3, All stats +3, Skill points +45, Moxie hint +1, Get Hot Topic status

unique_explanation: Recover HP by 5.5% when first 40% of the pack but second place or greater, during the mid-race.
review: Has a lot of recovery as a runner. After buffs, she will have an insane amount of recovery but it is inconsistent. Sometimes useful as an inheritance for Pace Chasers who need more stamina recovery.

secrets.conditions: Win the Satsuki Sho.
secrets.rewards: Energy -15, 1 random stat +10, Skill points +45, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4

secrets.conditions: Win the Tokyo Yushun (Japanese Derby).
secrets.rewards: Energy -15, 1 random stat +10, Skill points +45, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4

secrets.conditions: Win the Kikuka Sho.
secrets.rewards: All stats +3, Skill points +45, Get Shining Brightly status, Heal Under the Weather, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.25 and acceleration by 0.3 for 5.0s when 1st place, lesser than 1 length ahead of the uma behind, on a straight during the mid-race.
review: Meta uma for Dirt Champion's Meet for a while. With enough work, she can also be a strong Turf Front Runner. Also good for Team Trials.

secrets.conditions: Random event
Finish the Fan Promise by winning a race in that region
secrets.rewards: Mood +1, 2 stats +10, Skill points +10, Relevant track skill hint +5

secrets.conditions: Have at least 120000 fans before the finals

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when overtake target exists, between 50% to 75% of the pack on the final corner.
review: Very strong End Closer uma as she has easy access to Encroaching Shadow. Training her is a pain though.

secrets.conditions: Win the Nikkei Sho
secrets.rewards:
Practice Poor was healed
Mood +4, All stats +20, Skill points +70, Get Practice Perfect ◎ status

Practice Poor was not healed
Mood +4, All stats +15, Skill points +70, Heal Practice Poor

unique_explanation: Recover HP by 5.5% when last half of the pack, with at least 1 uma within 3m or 3 lanes, on the final corner.
review: Honestly not a very good uma. For Team Trials, she will most likely be slot into Dirt, but her skills are mainly recoveries, which isn't that needed. She can also be used for weird strategies in Champion's Meet (like Front Urara to set a very slow pace). Even though, she is not very good, she is very cute, so that is a big plus point.

secrets.conditions: Win the Arima Kinen (Year 3)
secrets.rewards: All stats +4, Skill points +63, Long Shot hint +1, Yayoi Akikawa bond +5

unique: I See Victory in My Future!
unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when 3rd place or greater, blocked in front and in the late-race.
review: Bad skills in general. Decent uma for Long Team Trials.

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.35 for 5.0s when in 3rd place, less than 1 length away from uma behind, and in the late-race.
review: Pure evil. Pure debuffer. Does she actually win? Nobody knows, but -stamina for everyone.

secrets.conditions: Place 3rd in any non-objective race.
Participate in the Satsuki Sho and beat Tokai Teio.
Participate in the Satsuki Sho and lsoe to Tokai Teio.
Participate in the Tokyo Yushun (Japanese Derby) and beat Tokai Teio.
Participate in the Tokyo Yushun (Japanese Derby) and lose to Tokai Teio.

unique_explanation: Increases speed by 0.45 for 5.0s when in 5th place (for Champion's Meet) or 5th to 7th place (for Team Trials), did not get rushed and is 200m away from the race end.
review: Honestly not a very good uma. Her unique is a walmart Oguri and her other skills don't really do much. Her career is also a bit on the more difficult side if you are new.

secrets.conditions: Win the Arima Kinen (Year 3)
secrets.rewards: Energy -15, 1 random stat +10, Skill points +45, Yayoi Akikawa bond +4
